Label: Purpose
Keyword: To improve search results with hidden free text tags and to give administrators a field for internal tags

Label: Entry Guidelines
Keyword: Enter tags that will be useful for enhancing searches and interpretation. Keywords will be in the metadata, but will be hidden to the user by default.

Label: Commentary
Keyword: These may be used for administrative purposes or to facilitate text searching without cluttering a facet or interface. They may be helpful for grouping items by an accession code or for alternate spellings of common terms.
